name: Lilliana Smith
bio:
I am a creatively driven, solutions-minded full-stack software engineer with a passion for intuitive design and function.

As a Marine Corps veteran, my previous military experience informs everything that I do: from my ability to adapt and adjust plans quickly to finding efficient, concise solutions for challenging problems.

In 2023, I made my first steps as a programmer when I attended and graduated from General Assembly's Software Engineering Immersive cohort. There, I learned Javascript, Python, HTML and CSS, and developed my skills with Express, Node, MongoDB, React, Django, and PostgreSQL.
